price: 88 Voués au feu éternel de l’Enfer, ils n’obtiendront ni allégement de leurs souffrances, ni répit.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
